comments: test_stream_onlys covering the steam query smoke cases for streaming only mode.

tests.name: stream tumble window max(value) aggregate group by id, window_start, window_end
tests.description: tumble window aggregate by max and group by id, window_start, window_end

statements.query: select id, max(value), window_start, window_end from tumble(test6_stream_only, timestamp, interval 5 second) group by id, window_start, window_end emit stream
select id, max(value), window_start, window_end from tumble(test6_stream_only, timestamp, interval 5 second) group by id, window_start, window_end emit stream
kill query where query_id = '601'
select id, max(value) from table(test6_stream_only) group by id, location

tests.name: stream query expected exception: not under aggregate and not in group
tests.description: expected exception

statements.query: select id, max(value), window_start, window_end from tumble(test6_stream_only, timestamp, interval 5 second) group by window_start, window_end emit stream

tests.name: stream query expected exception: global stream query w/ PERIODIC INTERVAL but no aggreagation
tests.description: expected exception

statements.query: SELECT * FROM test6_stream_only WHERE value >25 EMIT STREAM PERIODIC INTERVAL 2 SECOND

tests.name: stream query expected exception: stream query group by w/ both window_start and window_end lacked
tests.description: expected exception

statements.query: select id, max(value) from tumble(test6_stream_only, timestamp, interval 5 second) group by id emit stream after watermark

tests.name: stream tumble window with designated timestamp w/ out of order timestamp within window.
tests.description: stream tumble window with designated 5 sec timestamp.

statements.query: select max(value), window_start, window_end from tumble(test6_stream_only, timestamp, interval 5 second) group by window_start, window_end emit stream

tests.name: stream tumble window w/ 1st batch inputs data cross multiple windows - #104
tests.description: stream tumble window query and send 3 inptus in the first batch, the window_start of the next window should be based on the minimal timestamp of the first batch

statements.query: select window_start, window_end, max(timestamp), min(timestamp) from tumble(test6_stream_only, timestamp, interval 3 second) where value > 50 group by  window_start, window_end emit stream

tests.name: stream query w/ inputs with timestamp early than latest_stream_only timestamp in stream table
tests.description: stream query aggregate by max is created and then ingest data w/ timestamp early than latest_stream_only timestamp in stream table, projection based on the inputs should be emitted.

statements.query: select id, max(value), window_start, window_end from tumble(test6_stream_only, timestamp, interval 5 second) group by id, window_start, window_end emit stream

tests.name: stream tumble late events drop w/ window delay interval  - #107
tests.description: an example positive test_stream_only that uses insert into w/o column

statements.query: select window_start, window_end, count(*) from tumble(test6_stream_only, timestamp, interval 5 second) group by  window_start, window_end, value emit stream after watermark with delay interval 2 second

tests.name: stream tumble w/inputs across multiple windows for window start alignment and the last input in the middle of latest_stream_only window - #101
tests.description: stream tumble w/inputs across multiple windows for window start alignment and the last input in the middle of latest_stream_only window - #101

statements.query: select window_start, window_end, count(*) from tumble(test6_stream_only, timestamp, interval 3 second) where value > 50 group by  window_start, window_end emit stream

tests.name: stream query tumble window w/delay: no aggregation to be emit before delay gate
tests.description: steram query with 5sec window with delay 3 sec w/late events within 2 sec delay

statements.query: select window_start, window_end, count(*) from tumble(test6_stream_only, timestamp, interval 5 second) group by  window_start, window_end, value emit stream after watermark with delay interval 3 second

tests.name: stream query tumble window w/delay: no aggregation to be emit when delay gate
tests.description: steram query with 5sec window with delay 3 sec w/late events within 2 sec delay

statements.query: select window_start, window_end, count(*) from tumble(test6_stream_only, timestamp, interval 5 second) group by  window_start, window_end, value emit stream after watermark with delay interval 3 second

tests.name: stream hopping window max(value) aggregate group by id, window_start, window_end
tests.description: tumble window aggregate by max and group by id, window_start, window_end

statements.query: select id, max(value), window_start, window_end from hop(test6_stream_only, timestamp, interval 3 second, interval 5 second) group by id, window_start, window_end emit stream

tests.name: hopping window w/1st data not alinged with window start
tests.description: tranform function in subquery to extract timestamp from a json and run hopping on the subquery

statements.query: select id, max(value), window_start, window_end from hop(test6_stream_only, timestamp, interval 2 second, interval 5 second) group by id, window_start, window_end

tags: hopping window w/ slide interal > window interval
tests.name: stream hopping window max(value) aggregate group by id, window_start, window_end, slide interval > window interval
tests.description: tumble window aggregate by max and group by id, window_start, window_end

statements.query: select id, max(value), window_start, window_end from hop(test6_stream_only, timestamp, interval 5 second, interval 3 second) group by id, window_start, window_end emit stream

tests.name: stream hopping window count(*) w/delay
tests.description: tumble window aggregate by max and group by id, window_start, window_end

statements.query: select location, count(*), window_start, window_end from hop(test6_stream_only, timestamp, interval 3 second, interval 5 second) group by location, window_start, window_end emit stream after watermark with delay interval 2 second

tests.name: global-aggregation-by-max-and-group-by-id-w/by-default-periodic
tests.description: global aggregation by max and group by id, execute query, end query after 5 second

statements.query: select id, max(value) from test6_stream_only group by id limit 4 emit periodic 5s

tests.name: global sum distinct
tests.description: global aggregation sum distinct and group by id, execute query, end query after 5 second

statements.query: select id, sum(distinct value), count(distinct value) from test6_stream_only group by id limit 4 emit periodic 5s

tests.name: last x global aggregation w/where
tests.description: last 5s global aggregation count *

statements.query: select count(*) from test6_stream_only_no_default_tp_time where value >60 limit 5 emit last 5s

tests.name: last x tumble delay
tests.description: max(value) tumble 5s with delay 2s group by id, window_start, window_end and last 1m

statements.query: select id, max(value), window_start, window_end from tumble(test6_stream_only_no_default_tp_time, timestamp, 5s) group by id, window_start, window_end limit 6 emit after watermark with delay 2s and last 6s

tests.name: last x tumble delay with distinct
tests.description: last 20s tumble 5s count(*)

statements.query: select id, sum(distinct value), window_end from tumble(test6_stream_only_no_default_tp_time, timestamp, 5s) group by id, window_end emit after watermark with delay 2s and last 1s

tests.name: tumble w/transformed timestamp
tests.description: extract timestamp from json and run tumble on it

statements.query: select id, max(value), window_end from tumble(test6_stream_only, to_datetime(json_extract_string(json, 'create_time')), interval 5 second) group by id, window_end

tests.name: hop w/transformed timestamp
tests.description: tranform function in subquery and run tumble on the subquery

statements.query: select id, max(value), window_end from hop(test6_stream_only, to_time(json_extract_string(json, 'create_time')), interval 2 second, interval 5 second) where window_end < '2021-11-02 20:00:09' group by id, window_end

tests.name: stream tail join table
tests.description: stream tail join table

statements.query: select a.id, b.type, a.value from test6_stream_only as a join table(test6_stream_only_d) as b on a.id = b.id

tests.name: stream table join table w/o aggregation
tests.description: stream table join table w/o aggregation

statements.query: select a.id, b.type, a.value from table(test6_stream_only) as a join table(test6_stream_only_d) as b on a.id = b.id where a.value < 70

tests.name: stream table join table w/ aggregation
tests.description: stream table join table w/ aggregation

statements.query: select a.id, b.type, max(value) from table(test6_stream_only) as a join table(test6_stream_only_d) as b on a.id = b.id group by a.id, b.type

tests.name: stream table join table w/ aggregation and where
tests.description: stream table join table w/ aggregation and where

statements.query: select a.id, b.type, max(value) from table(test6_stream_only) as a join table(test6_stream_only_d) as b on a.id = b.id where b.type = 'field' or b.type = 'roof' group by a.id, b.type

tests.name: stream global aggregation join table
tests.description: global stream aggregation join table

statements.query: select a.id, b.type, max(value) from test6_stream_only as a join table(test6_stream_only_d) as b on a.id = b.id group by a.id, b.type limit 7 emit periodic 5s

tests.name: stream global aggregation join table w/where
tests.description: global stream aggregation join table w/where

statements.query: select a.id, b.type, max(value) from test6_stream_only as a join table(test6_stream_only_d) as b on a.id = b.id where b.type = 'roof' or b.type = 'field' group by a.id, b.type limit 3 emit periodic 5s
